title: Andy Cowan: "Banging My Head Against the Wall"
description: Michael's conversation with comedy writer Andy Cowan, who wrote the Seinfeld "The Opposite" episode, on his book "Banging My Head Against the Wall: A Comedy Writer's Guide to Seeing Stars." Original air date 6 July 2018. The book was published on 28 June 2018.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Andy Cowan, Michael Smerconish)
